original_text: And Aaron and his sons thou shalt bring unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and shalt wash them with water.
korean_text: 너는 아론과 그의 아들들을 회막 문으로 데려다가 물로 씻기고

sentences.original_text: thou shalt bring unto the door
of the tabernacle of the congregation
and shalt wash them with water
